net.dragondelve.customdriversutil.gui.editor

Interface Editor<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    StageController
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    OverrideFlagsEditor, TrackLibraryEditor, VehicleClassLibraryEditor

    public interface Editor<T>
extends StageController
    JavaFX Editor that can edit an ObservableList of items of T.

        javafx.collections.ObservableList<T> getItems()

      • setItems

        void setItems(javafx.collections.ObservableList<T> items)
        Lightweight mutator method. Should be called before the editor is displayed to the user.
        Parameters:
        items - an observableList of items of T.
